authors: The prettiest girl at the party AKA Connor

item.name: Pinkie of the Celestial
entries: When {@creature Mycelius - Fiendish Contagious Fungus|WOR|Mycelius} was defeated two objects appeared. A {@item Demon Core|WOR} and a severed pinkie that radiated a celestial essence
The pinkie houses a forgetful and seemingly friendly personality that wants to be made whole.
When attuned, the pinkie can detect other fingers like itself withing 30 miles.

item.name: Demon Core
entries: A crimson orb that can give the weilder great power for a terrible price. At the cost of one's soul, the Demon Core can grant the user near unmatched power.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This item is cursed, a fact that is revealed only when an {@spell identify} spell is cast on the core or you attune to it. Attuning to the core curses you until you are targeted by the {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic. While cursed you seek the most violent path possible to accomplish you goals.

itemGroup.name: Fingers of the Celestial
entries: Fingers with incredible celestial energy that have been corrupted and housed in {@item Demon Core|WOR|Demon Cores} to grant incredible power.
